subject: Rewrite tutorial in plain language for non-technical users
body:
- Introduce "cells" concept upfront (Welcome step)
- Replace jargon: CDN → removed, overlay → color tint, full bleed →
  single full image, markdown → rich text, PWA → removed,
  aspect ratio → shape, typography → fonts, context bar → below tabs
- Reframe from feature lists to task-oriented guidance
  ("Choose how to arrange your cells" vs "Grid structure presets")
- Add helpful context ("great for making text readable over images")
- Simplify Tips step: removed "Refresh" tip, clarified locations
